title: Heritage
description: Alex has managed to stop a worldwide viral outbreak but she must now fight her way out of the resulting chaos to prevent an even more disastrous threat. After escaping capture by a plotting regime, she calls upon her friends and own unique abilities to discover Earth's true past and determine its fate. Amid a society on the verge of collapse, they battle unseen forces and unlock ancient secrets in an attempt to save the human race. Heritage is Book Two in the Forgotten Origins Trilogy. Be sure to read Book One; Bloodline.
author: Tara Ellis
